about_the_game:
Candy Arkanoid is a modern and addictive twist on the classic arcade game genre. This game combines the fast-paced gameplay of Rogue-like Arkanoid with RPG elements to create a unique gaming experience. With classic arkanoid controls and RPG Rogue-like mechanics.

Collect bonuses to gain an advantage and earn points to level up and upgrade your abilities.
You can upgrade in four ways:
  • Damage
  • Crit
  • Splash
  • Split
Each upgrade enhances your skills and helps you defeat more challenging levels.
Candy Arkanoid offers endless replay value for players of all skill levels.

Buy Candy Arkanoid now and experience the addictive gameplay and challenging levels for yourself. Upgrade your skills and dominate the game with your superior abilities. Get ready to unleash the ultimate candy-breaking skills in this exciting and fun arcade game.

Try my another game for free:

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux x64
  • Processor: Dual core processor 2.0ghz or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon R7 250, NVIDIA GT 550 or better
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Linux compatible audio card
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Linux x64
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4430, AMD FX-6300 or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon RX 560, NVIDIA GTX 1050-Ti or better
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Linux compatible audio card

name: Candy Arkanoid

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 x64 or above
  • Processor: Dual core processor 2.0ghz or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 compatible video card
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows compatible audio card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 x64
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4430, AMD FX-6300 or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon RX 560, NVIDIA GTX 1050-Ti or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows compatible audio card

short_description: Candy Arkanoid is more than just a simple arcade game - it also includes RPG and Rogue-like elements, allowing players to level up their Arkanoid and customize its abilities. So why wait? Satisfy your sweet tooth and soon blast your way through the candy cosmos!
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Dutch, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Turkish, Czech, Simplified Chinese, Korean, Thai, Japanese, Bulgarian, Hungarian, Vietnamese, Greek, Danish, Spanish - Latin America, Traditional Chinese, Norwegian, Romanian, Ukrainian, Finnish, Swedish
